description: sketch of Madonna and Child at top center with figures in the sky at L and R; other adoring figures standing below, including two figures in liturgical hats and bald man at L
provenance: Sale, Christie's, London, Dec. 8, 1987, no. 41, as "Attributed to Alessandro Tiarini", bought in; Sale, Christie's, London, July 5, 1988, lot 239 as Giovanni Biliverti; sold to Moir
title: Madonna and Child with Saint Charles Borromeo and Other Saints
